name: Illegal Alien Trafficking
description:
Play as an intergalactic criminal smuggling cuddly Alien babies while cheating the law and being faster than the police their radar!

Crazy Taxi meets A first person Space Sim!

Game by Tim Buhrs
Music by Joshua Lee

Controls:

  • Mouse to look around
  • WASD to move
  • Space & Shift to go higher and Lower
  • Q & E to tilt

This game was made for the Major Jam 4 in a total of 5 days!
And this is my first game as a solo dev, all the assets, code and designs are made from scratch in this period of time.

Warning: Not suitable for people who tend to get motion sickness
